title: William Howard Taft National Historic Site: Bookstore
body: Bookstore           Some of the items for sale at the bookstore inside the Taft Education Center. NPS Photo  Cooperating Association  The park's cooperating association, Eastern National, manages the bookstore at the Taft Education Center. We offer a variety of books, postcards, games, and other educational materials related to the park's historical resources.  Â        Eastern National was founded by NPS rangers in 1947 at Gettysburg National Military Park.   Eastern National & Online Bookstore Eastern National provides William Howard Taft National Historic Site with interpretive materials that enhances visitors' knowledge of the site and of our 27th President &10th Chief Justice, William Howard Taft.  The bookstore also has many items that would be perfect for that special, memorable gift. Online Bookstore If you can't make it to the park, you can visit the park's Online Bookstore and make an online purchase from a limited selection of items. A portion of the profits is returned to the park to support interpretive and management programs. You can learn more about our Cooperating Association partner Eastern National, by visiting their website.
